desc: Gerson & Gerson Inc. is the parent company of Bonnie Baby, Bonnie Jean, Jessica Ann, Iris & Ivy, and Blue Gorgeous. Shop Children's Clothing Wholesale: Girls Dresses, Girls Outfits, Coat Sets, Legging Sets. Dressing Girls Since 1935.

layout.text: Since 1935, we have spent every day making that special connection between a girl and her new dress.
